who have children under the age of 4, to spend on 
milk, plain fresh and frozen fruit and vegetables and 
infant formula milk. You can also get free vitamins.
ICP Support
www.icpsupport.org
Supportline	(Tuesday–Friday,	10	am–2	pm)	
07939 871929
ICP Support was originally set up in 1991  to provide 
a support and information line for women who 
thought they might have intrahepatic cholestasis of 
pregnancy (ICP) and wanted to know more about it.
